item.description:
Updated on 6/13/2010:

After checking South Trailhead of Long Trail on Rt 108, Stowe VT this weekend, I found that it's very difficult to spot cars since there are 2-3 parking spaces which are scattered around the trailhead on Rt 108.

So I'd like to propose to meet all of hikers at the different location (=Shaw's super market on Rt 100 near I-89 Exit 10.)

I re-wrote the "suggested meetup locations" section below. Based on the change of meetup location, I also updated meetup time. Please read this carefully.




This is cross posted hiking event from my meetup group, Hiking/Snowshoeing Vermont Meetup.

Let's hike together to the highest mountain in Vermont! Each year, about 40,000 people visit this mountain. You'll be one of them after this hiking event!

Although I generally use Butler Lodge Trail from Underhill, West side of the mountain, I'd like to take a different route and explore the mountain from the east side. This makes it easier for us to park our cars at the trailhead as well as the final destination with the shortest amount of driving time.




Hiking Plan:

7:20AM Spot cars at Shaw's super market parking lot on Rt 100. Leave here no later than 7:30AM.
8:00AM We all drive to South the LT Trailhead on Rt 108. Leave some cars here. Drive other cars to the trailhead on Nebraska Valley Rd.
8:25AM Arrive at the Lake Mansfield Trout Club Parking Lot at the end of Nebraska Valley Rd.
8:40AM Start Hiking from Lake Mansfield Trailhead
After reaching Taylor Lodge, we take Long Trail to North.
We hike through LT and get to Forehead, The Nose, then, eventually we reach to the highest peak in Vermont, The Chin (4393 ft). We hike out to Long Trail parking lot on Rt 108. We'll pick up cars at the trailhead on Nebraska Valley Rd.

Hiking Level:
Moderate to Difficult. Total mileage is approximately 10.4 miles, but most of the mileage are ridgeline.
We'll hike slow to moderate pace. (1-1.5 mph), it will take at least, 7+ hours.





Suggested Meetup Location:

Shaw's ( Super market ) on Rt 100 at 7:20AM
Address: 820 Waterbury Stowe Rd, Waterbury, VT
Please refer this JPG link to see the exact location at the Shaw's parking lot.

See the attached MapQuest map link. (less than 5 min drive on Rt 100 North from I-89 Exit-10(Waterbury, Stowe).



For your reference, here is the Google map link from Long Trail Trailhead (position A) to the trailhead of our hiking (position B).

At last, I attached topo map which I roughly drew the trail path which we'll be taking on this hiking event.
It also shows meetup location on Rt 108 as well.


Any questions? Please email me directly instead of posting message on the web site so that we can decrease email traffic.

Event Organizer,
Tomoko Nakajima
item.name: Mt Mansfield (The Chin 4393 ft!!) Hike in Vermont
